gobblin.runtime

Class MysqlDatasetStateStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metastore.MysqlStateStore<JobState.DatasetState>
      • gobblin.runtime.MysqlDatasetStateStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetStateStore<JobState.DatasetState>, StateStore<JobState.DatasetState>

    public class MysqlDatasetStateStore
extends MysqlStateStore<JobState.DatasetState>
implements DatasetStateStore<JobState.DatasetState>
    A custom extension to MysqlStateStore for storing and reading JobState.DatasetStates.

    The purpose of having this class is to hide some implementation details that are unnecessarily exposed if using the MysqlStateStore to store and serve job/dataset states between job runs.

    In addition to persisting and reading JobState.DatasetStates. This class is also able to read job state files of existing jobs that store serialized instances of JobState for backward compatibility.
